General.Name: Isracard Ltd
General.Description: Isracard Ltd. operates as a credit card company in Israel. The company offers various payment solutions, including Digital credit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Garmin Pay, Topcash, and Isracard application. It also provides credit and finance services, as well discounting and settlement services for the debit card brands, such as Isracard, MasterCard, American Express, and Visa. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Bnei Brak, Israel.
